00022 /**
00023  * @file   QuantMethodGTypeExprChipSummary.cpp
00024  * @author Alan Williams
00025  *
00026  * @brief  Class for accumulating some run statistics from a
00027  *         genotyping run from the expression quant method
00028  *
00029  */

00031 
00032 #include "chipstream/QuantMethodGTypeExprChipSummary.h"
00033 
00034 QuantMethodGTypeExprChipSummary::QuantMethodGTypeExprChipSummary(const std::string& analysisName) {
00035   setValid(false);
00036   m_AnalysisName = analysisName;
00037   // these are set to reduce the debuging warnings.
00038   setFilename("QuantMethodGTypeExprChipSummary-DEBUG"); // not used.
00039   setFormat(affx::TsvReport::FMT_TSV); // not used.
00040 
00041   declareMetric("allele_summarization_mean",ChipSummary::Metric::Double);
00042   declareMetric("allele_summarization_stdev",ChipSummary::Metric::Double);
00043   declareMetric("allele_deviation_mean",ChipSummary::Metric::Double);
00044   declareMetric("allele_deviation_stdev",ChipSummary::Metric::Double);
00045   declareMetric("allele_mad_residuals_mean",ChipSummary::Metric::Double);
00046   declareMetric("allele_mad_residuals_stdev",ChipSummary::Metric::Double);
00047 }
00048 
00049 /** 
00050  * Get set up for a run of reporting probesets. Often used to open file
00051  * streams and print headers to files etc.
00052  * 
00053  * @param qMethod - Quantification method to be used.
00054  * 
00055  * @return true if success, false otherwise.
00056  */
00057 bool QuantMethodGTypeExprChipSummary::prepare(QuantMethod &qMethod, const IntensityMart &iMart) {
00058   bool allOk = true;
00059   int chipCount = iMart.getCelFileCount();
00060   for(int i=0; i<chipCount; i++) {
00061     std::vector<ChipSummary::Metric> metrics;
00062     m_SummaryStats.push_back(metrics);
00063   }
00064   //    m_IntensitySummary.resize(chipCount);
00065   m_AlleleSummary.resize(chipCount);
00066   m_MadResidualSummary.resize(chipCount);
00067   m_AbsDeviation.resize(chipCount);
00068   return allOk;
00069 }
00070 
00071 /** 
00072  * After every probeset computation this function is called an is an opportunity
00073  * to query the quantification method for results, residuals, etc.
00074  * 
00075  * @param psGroup - List of probesets from which probes were used.
00076  * @param qMethod - Quantification method with compute method called.
00077  * 
00078  * @return true if success, false otherwise.
00079  */
00080 bool QuantMethodGTypeExprChipSummary::report(ProbeSetGroup &psGroup, QuantMethod &qMethod,
00081                                              const IntensityMart &iMart, std::vector<ChipStream *> &iTrans, 
00082                                              PmAdjuster &pmAdjust) {
00083   QuantExprMethod *qeMethod = dynamic_cast<QuantExprMethod *>(&qMethod);
00084   if(qeMethod == NULL) {
00085     Err::errAbort("QuantMethodGTypeExprChipSummary::report() Can only use a QuantExprMethod object.");
00086   }
00087   addAlleleSummary(*qeMethod);
00088   addMadResiduals(*qeMethod);
00089   return true;
00090 }
00091 
00092 /** 
00093  * If a probeset fails to compute for whatever reason then this method is
00094  * called rather than the normal report call above. By default does nothing.
00095  * 
00096  * @param psGroup - List of probesets from which probes were used.
00097  * @param qMethod - Quantification method with compute method called.
00098  * 
00099  * @return true if success, false otherwise.
00100  */
00101 bool QuantMethodGTypeExprChipSummary::reportFailure(ProbeSetGroup &psGroup, QuantMethod &qMethod,
00102                                                     const IntensityMart &iMart, std::vector<ChipStream *> &iTrans, 
00103                                                     PmAdjuster &pmAdjust) {
00104 
00105   // do nothing.
00106   return true;
00107 }
00108 
00109 /** 
00110  * Add the summary statistics for the raw intensity of probes in this probeset group.
00111  *  
00112  * @param psGroup - Probes to be added.
00113  * @param iMart - Data to get intensity from.
00114  */
00115 void QuantMethodGTypeExprChipSummary::addIntensityValues(ProbeSetGroup &psGroup, const IntensityMart &iMart) {
00116   int chipCount = iMart.getCelFileCount();
00117   std::vector<double> values(chipCount);
00118   for(unsigned int groupIx = 0; groupIx < psGroup.probeSets.size(); groupIx++) {
00119     const ProbeSet *ps = psGroup.probeSets[groupIx];
00120     for(unsigned int atomIx = 0; atomIx < ps->atoms.size(); atomIx++) {
00121       Atom *a = ps->atoms[atomIx];
00122       for(unsigned int probeIx = 0; probeIx < a->probes.size(); probeIx++) {
00123         Probe *p = a->probes[probeIx];
00124         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < chipCount; i++) {
00125           values[i] = log2(max((double)iMart.getProbeIntensity(p->id, i), DBL_MIN));
00126         } /* chips. */
00127         m_IntensitySummary.addData(values);
00128       } /* probes. */
00129     } /* atoms. */
00130   } /* probesets. */
00131 }
00132   
00133 void QuantMethodGTypeExprChipSummary::addAlleleSummary(QuantExprMethod &qMethod) {
00134   std::vector<double> values;
00135   std::vector<double> deviation;
00136   for(unsigned int i = 0; i < qMethod.getNumTargets(); i++) {
00137     values.push_back(log2(max(qMethod.getTargetEffect(i), DBL_MIN)));
00138   }
00139 
00140   m_AlleleSummary.addData(values);
00141   double med = median(values.begin(), values.end());
00142   for(unsigned int i = 0; i < values.size(); i++) {
00143     deviation.push_back(fabs(med - values[i]));
00144   }
00145   m_AbsDeviation.addData(deviation);
00146 }
00147 
00148 void QuantMethodGTypeExprChipSummary::addMadResiduals(QuantExprMethod &qMethod) {
00149   static bool warned = false;
00150   bool useResidual = qMethod.haveResiduals();
00151   std::vector<double> values(qMethod.getNumTargets());
00152   std::vector<double> chipVals(qMethod.getNumFeatures());
00153   if(!useResidual && !warned) {
00154     Verbose::out(1, "Warning: qMethod: " + ToStr(qMethod.getType()) + " doesn't have residuals, using zero.");
00155     warned = true;
00156   }
00157   for(unsigned int chipIx = 0; chipIx < qMethod.getNumTargets(); chipIx++) {
00158     for(unsigned int featIx = 0; featIx < qMethod.getNumFeatures(); featIx++) {
00159       if(useResidual)
00160         chipVals[featIx] = fabs(qMethod.getResidual(featIx, chipIx));
00161       else
00162         chipVals[featIx] = 0;
00163     }
00164     values[chipIx] = median(chipVals.begin(), chipVals.end());
00165   }
00166   m_MadResidualSummary.addData(values);
00167 }
00168 
00169 /** 
00170  * No more probesets will be processed, this is a chance to finish outputting
00171  * results and clean up.
00172  * @param qMethod - Quantification method that was used.
00173  * @return true if success, false otherwise.
00174  */
00175 bool QuantMethodGTypeExprChipSummary::finish(QuantMethod &qMethod) {
00176 
00177   // Load up other metrics computed in m_Stats
00178   for(int chip = 0; chip < m_SummaryStats.size(); chip++) {
00179 
00180     m_SummaryStats[chip].push_back(ChipSummary::Metric("allele_summarization_mean", m_AlleleSummary.getMean(chip)));
00181     m_SummaryStats[chip].push_back(ChipSummary::Metric("allele_summarization_stdev", m_AlleleSummary.getStdev(chip)));
00182     m_SummaryStats[chip].push_back(ChipSummary::Metric("allele_deviation_mean", m_AbsDeviation.getMean(chip)));
00183     m_SummaryStats[chip].push_back(ChipSummary::Metric("allele_deviation_stdev", m_AbsDeviation.getStdev(chip)));
00184     m_SummaryStats[chip].push_back(ChipSummary::Metric("allele_mad_residuals_mean", m_MadResidualSummary.getMean(chip)));
00185     m_SummaryStats[chip].push_back(ChipSummary::Metric("allele_mad_residuals_stdev", m_MadResidualSummary.getStdev(chip)));
00186   }
00187 
00188   setValid(true);
00189   return true;
00190 }
